name: I need energy!
description:
Are you in search of an awesome  GameBoy-styled platformer game?

Well... it seems like you are in luck!

Get a taste of I need power! by playing this demo right now. There are 4 short levels, that you can complete in a few minutes (The game is just a "lite" version of the final product, so any tips on how i could improve the game or ideas that i could add in the game would be appreciated!)

In the demo version there are no enemies (i plan on adding some in the near future), along with waaaaaaaay shorter levels (less than 1 min each, except level 3, which may take longer depending on your experience level)

Controls:

• Mobile: 

- On-screen arrows

• Computer:

- Walking: a,s,d OR left-arrow, down-arrow, right-arrow, OR num-4,  num-5, num-6

- Jump: w OR space OR arrow-up OR num-8

The game can be played on mobile or desktop (just be sure to check out the in game setting)

Credits:

• Music and tileset by Richt Mackro

• Coding, Level design + the rest of the game were made by myself.

Game engine & programming language:

• Godot

• GDScript
